job_tasks.phrase: support the development of product road maps, advise on future product definition and system specifications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in strategic planning and defining future product direction, which aligns with understanding business goals and translating them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties to improve the decision processes
job_tasks.justification: This relates to facilitating effective communication for decision-making, which is a key aspect of aligning technical work with business processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrating knowledge from various function clusters for full system understanding in terms of fleet performance
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly AI/ML modeling, 'integrating knowledge' and achieving 'full system understanding' in terms of performance can be interpreted as a form of system modeling or analysis which is a precursor to or part of more advanced modeling tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitor integrity of system architecture during development, ensure the availability of Test Specifications, and coordinate or execute the testing process. As well as analyze and report out results
job_tasks.justification: This involves managing system architecture and testing processes, which are core components of software development and quality assurance.

job_tasks.phrase: Plan and perform engineering work concerned with unique problems that have a major effect on fleet performance
job_tasks.justification: This describes engineering work focused on solving complex problems to improve system performance, which is a broad aspect of engineering and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Define, plan, manage own backlog of work
job_tasks.justification: Managing one's own backlog of work is a fundamental aspect of project management and operational execution within an engineering context, often involving planning and tracking tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: creative way of thinking and do you like to be challenged in solving complex problems
opportunity for professional development and personal growth
true self-starter who likes to understand and improve a complex high power laser and optical system
ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on complex high-power laser and optical systems, not on AI or ML. While it mentions problem-solving and system understanding, there are no indicators of generative AI, LLMs, or traditional machine learning modeling techniques.
